ModulePrefs.title: Free Music Hub Radio
ModulePrefs.description: Plays free music 24/7, mostly EBM and electro-industrial music from Russia.
ModulePrefs.author: Justin Forest

Module.Content: <object type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="280" height="104" data="http://dev.freemusichub.net/static/player.swf?file=http%3A%2F%2Fradio.deadchannel.ru%3A8000%2Fstream.mp3&width=280&height=104&controlbar=none&link=http://radio.deadchannel.ru/&image=http%3A%2F%2Fhome.umonkey.net%2Fpublic%2Fg%2Fradio%2Flogo.radio.280x104.png&type=sound&duration=-1"> <param name="movie" value="http://radio.deadchannel.ru:8000/stream.mp3" /> <param name="wmode" value="transparent" /> </object>
